content: This is just a gut feeling and I have nothing to back it up but I feel like I am now seeing more "impreciseness" on hover. As in... things that used to return one result now return more than one result. I think it's showing up most often with salsa queries
I feel like we aren't handling type parameters very well at the moment. I don't know if that's related or a different thing
Speaking of which, I think it would be really cool to show the inferred type parameters in the UI, like we do for type hints
